summary: This is an email forwarding a courtesy copy of a bail application filing in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330). The email is from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to prosecutors and other defense attorneys, indicating legal proceedings are ongoing.

events.title: Bail Application Filing in U.S. v. Maxwell
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim files a bail application on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell in case 20 Cr. 330.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a bail application filing in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The filing date is February 23, 2021, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case at that time.
The email shows communication between defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim and other legal counsel (Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, Jeff Pagliuca).
The attached document is titled 'MAXWELL_BAIL_APPLICATION_with_EXHIBIT_2-23-17.pdf', suggesting it contains a bail application and exhibits.
The email includes a standard confidentiality notice from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim.
